name: Barbara
title: Shining Idol
description: Every denizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. However, she learned the word "idol" from a magazine.

normalattack.name: Whisper of Water
normalattack.description: Shoot up to four splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG.

elementalskill.name: Let the Show Begin
elementalskill.description: Creates a temporary Melody Loop around Barbara. When Barbara does her Normal Attacks, other party members gain health. Her Charged Attacks regenerate party health by four times the amount of healing.

elementalburst.name: Shining Miracle
elementalburst.description: Heals party members and allies with 17.6% her HP + 1,694.

passivetalent1.name: With My Whole Heart
passivetalent1.description: There's a 12% chance of getting two food items when achieving Perfect Cooking.

passivetalent2.name: Glorious Season
passivetalent2.description: When Barbara uses Melody Loop, party members' stamina consumption reduces by 12%.

passivetalent3.name: Encore
passivetalent3.description: Whenever Barbara gains an Elemental Orb/Particle during Let the Show Begin, the Memory Loop is extended by 1s with a max extension limit of 5s.

constellations.d2:
Decreases the CD of Let the Show Begin by 15%. 
 During the ability's duration, the current character gains 15% Hydro DMG Bonus.
constellations.d3:
Increases the Level of Shining Miracle by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d4: Every enemy hit by Barbara's Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her. A maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.
constellations.d5:
Increase the Level of Let the Show Begin by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d6:
When Barbara is not on the field, and the character in play falls, 
Automatically revives this character and Fully regenerates this characters HP by 100%. 
 This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

profile.description:
Barbara is the Deaconess of the Favonius Church, as well as the shining idol of Mondstadt.
"The sight of Barbara makes all my problems disappear". This is quite a common saying among the denizens of Mondstadt.
In fact, Barbara can do much more than just put people in a better mood: Her healing powers extend to flesh wounds and other physical ailments. Barbara is known to have access to miraculous healing powers through her Hydro Vision.
However, Barbara herself knows that the most miraculous magic of all is hard work.

zhdescription: 蒙德城的大家都喜欢芭芭拉。芭芭拉是西风教会的祈礼牧师，同时也是蒙德城的闪耀偶像。

zhnormalattack.name: 水之浅唱
zhnormalattack.description:
普通攻击：进行至多四段的水花攻击，造成水元素伤害。
重击：消耗一定体力，短暂咏唱后，对前方所有敌人造成水元素范围伤害。

zhelementalskill.name: 演唱，开始♪
zhelementalskill.description:
唤出歌声般跃动的水珠，形成歌声之环，对周围的敌人造成水元素伤害，并施加潮湿状态。

歌声之环
芭芭拉的普通攻击命中时，为队伍中自己的角色，以及附近的友方角色恢复生命值，回复量受益于芭芭拉的生命值上限; 重击命中时，能产生4倍回复量; 每隔一段时间，为当前场上自己的角色恢复生命值;对角色与触及的敌人施加潮湿状态。芭芭拉的音乐就是治疗大家的魔法。

zhelementalburst.name: 闪耀奇迹
zhelementalburst.description: 治愈大家的心就是芭芭拉战斗与歌唱的力量。基于芭芭拉的生命值上限，为队伍中所有角色恢复大量生命值。

zhpassivetalent3.name: 心意注入
zhpassivetalent3.description: 完美烹饪恢复类食物时，有12%概率获得2倍产出。

zhpassivetalent1.name: 光辉的季节
zhpassivetalent1.description: 角色在歌声之环状态下时，体力消耗降低12％。

zhpassivetalent2.name: 安可
zhpassivetalent2.description: 获得元素晶球或元素微粒时，延长演唱，开始小的持续时间秒。至多延长5秒。。

zhconstellations.d1: 芭芭拉每10秒会恢复1点元素能量。
zhconstellations.d2: 「演唱，开始♪」的冷却时间降低15%；  技能持续期间，当前场上自己的角色获得15%水元素伤害加成。
zhconstellations.d3: 【闪耀奇迹】的技能等级提高3级。至多提升至15级。
zhconstellations.d4: 芭芭拉使用重击时，每命中一个敌人，就会为芭芭拉恢复1点元素能量。通过这种方式，一次至多回复5点元素能量。
zhconstellations.d5: 【演唱，开始】的技能等级提高3级。至多提升至15级。
zhconstellations.d6: 当芭芭拉处于队伍后台时，队伍中自己的角色倒下时，则立即：复苏该角色；将该角色生命值恢复至100%  该效果每15分钟只能触发一次。
